body_html: @martinwicke There are some other TF APIs that have been both documented and clearly marked as experimental and subject to change, which I think would work well here. I agree regarding relocating to contrib as well. How does that sounds as an approach?
body_text: @martinwicke There are some other TF APIs that have been both documented and clearly marked as experimental and subject to change, which I think would work well here. I agree regarding relocating to contrib as well.  How does that sounds as an approach?
body: @martinwicke There are some other TF APIs that have been both documented and clearly marked as experimental and subject to change, which I think would work well here. I agree regarding relocating to contrib as well.  How does that sounds as an approach?
